messages.title: What this Election is About
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: Helping Young People Buy Their Own Home
messages.content: As a mum, Val knows that getting onto the property ladder is a struggle for many people. Val supports local families on a variety of issues, including home ownership and development on brownfield sites.

messages.title: Making a Success of Brexit
messages.content: Only a Conservative Government, under Theresa May, can make a success of Brexit. Val will back Theresa May and take the plan for a stronger, united Britain to the House of Commons.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Establish Britain as the strongest country
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building a stronger economy that rewards those who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.
Ensuring the opportunity for everyone to get on in life, by providing affordable housing and high-quality healthcare.
Take action against the extremists who try to divide us and take control of our borders and laws.

issues.brexitEurope: Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain’s hand in the Brexit negotiations.
issues.economy: Building a stronger economy that rewards those who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.
issues.government: Providing strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
issues.health: We will provide everyone with access to high-quality healthcare.
issues.immigration: Take control of our borders and laws.
issues.labourEmployment: We will stick to the Plan for a Stronger Britain and take the difficult decisions needed for Britain to succeed at home.

community.content: Val is supporting development on brownfield sites.

leaflet.personalStatement: Val Allen, a local mum, understands the struggles of getting onto the property ladder and supports families on home ownership and development.

politicalExperience.achievements: Supports development on brownfield sites, backs Theresa May’s plan for a stronger Britain.

endorsements.endorsement: Strong and stable leadership for Warrington.

quotes.text: We need a General Election now to secure the strong and stable leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.

images.caption: Val Allen and Theresa May will provide viable leadership for our town.
Val is supporting development on brownfield sites.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Local people have welcomed the apprenticeships that Val Allen has supported in Warrington North.

examples: Over 12,000 apprenticeships started in Warrington North.
Cut the deficit, control debt and help young people buy affordable homes.
Strong and stable leadership for Warrington.
Strong leadership for a stronger Britain.
Val is supporting development on brownfield sites.
Local people have welcomed the apprenticeships Val Allen supports.

Providing strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
Take action against the extremists who try to divide us.
